languages.text: "Дух говорит о нашей работе. О комплементат-ритуале и предшествовавших бдениях. Они потревожили его".

traits.locale_text: "Дух говорит о нашей работе. О комплиментат-ритуале и предшествовавших бдениях. Они потревожили его".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."
languages.original_text: "Дух говорит о нашей работе. О комплементат-ритуале и предшествовавших бдениях. Они потревожили его".

traits.locale_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."

traits.locale_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「精霊は私たちの苦労に注意を向けている。補足の儀式とそれより前の儀式。精霊は彼らに悩まされている」
languages.original_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."

traits.locale_text: 「精霊は私たちの苦労に注意を向けている。補足の儀式とそれより前の儀式。精霊は彼らに悩まされている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “机魂指的是我们的劳作，即重组仪式和之前的一系列仪式。机魂被它们弄烦了。”
languages.original_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."

traits.locale_text: “机魂指的是我们的劳作，即重组仪式和之前的一系列仪式。机魂被它们弄烦了。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Geist bezieht sich auf unsere Bemühungen. Auf das Complementa-Ritual und die Rituale, die ihm vorausgegangen sind. Sie beunruhigen den Geist."
languages.original_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."

traits.locale_text: "Der Geist bezieht sich auf unsere Bemühungen. Auf das Complementa-Ritual und die Rituale, die ihm vorausgegangen sind. Sie beunruhigen den Geist."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « L'esprit fait référence à nos travaux, au rituel complémentaire et aux rites qui l'ont précédé. Ils le perturbent. »
languages.original_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."

traits.locale_text: « L'esprit fait référence à nos travaux, au rituel complémentaire et aux rites qui l'ont précédé. Ils le perturbent. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El espíritu se refiere a nuestros esfuerzos. Al complementa-ritual y a los ritos que le precedieron. Parece que preocupan al espíritu».
languages.original_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."

traits.locale_text: «El espíritu se refiere a nuestros esfuerzos. Al complementa-ritual y a los ritos que le precedieron. Parece que preocupan al espíritu».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu ruh, bizim uğraşlarımıza referans veriyor... Tümleyici ayine ve öncesinde dile getirilen dualara. Bunlar ruhu huzursuz ediyor."
languages.original_text: "The spirit is referring to our toils. To the complementa-ritual and the rites that preceded it. The spirit is troubled by them."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ruh, bizim uğraşlarımıza referans veriyor... Tümleyici ayine ve öncesinde dile getirilen dualara. Ruh, bunlardan dolayı huzursuz."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
